content.d: Are you sure you want to help out today too?
It’s totally fine! As I said before, I owe a lot to this shrine.
Then I’ll give you another reward, Hanayo-chan...
Ah, wait, wait! That’s my job today!
Remember when I helped out here last time? You treated me to pancakes and cream soda as a reward, Nozomi-chan!
That place was delicious, wasn’t it~?
Yeah! ...I mean! Nozomi-chan deserves a reward too! So today, I’ll give you a reward!
Why are you so surprised? It’s okay for me to give you a reward, right?
I’m happy, but... you’re helping me out today too, right...?
The spring limited-time drink is almost gone, so let’s drink it with all the toppings!
